params.smartCol: The address of the dex for which the smart collateral is used.
params.smartDebt: The address of the dex for which the smart debt is used.
params.vault: The address of the newly deployed vault.
params.vaultId: The id of the newly deployed vault.

constructor.details: each vault type has different vaultAdminImplementation but same vaultSecondaryImplementatio

operateCreationCode().details: Retrieves the creation code for the Operate contract

VAULT_T4_CREATIONCODE_MAIN_ADDRESS_1.details: SSTORE2 pointer for the VaultT4 creation code. Stored externally to reduce factory bytecode (in 2 parts)

FluidLiquidateResult(uint256,uint256).notice: used to simulate liquidation to find the maximum liquidatable amounts

VaultT4Deployed(address,uint256,address,.notice: Emitted when a new vaultT4 is deployed.

mainCreationCode().notice: returns the stored DexT1 creation bytecode
